name: The Story Goes On Chapter 6
summary: The heroes narrowly escape the collapsing Temple of Lumina, but their victory is short-lived as the corrupted crystal destabilizes, opening a rift to the Shadow Realm. Entering the Shadow Lord’s domain, they confront his growing power, ultimately shattering the crystal—only to inadvertently unleash him. Guided by a mysterious Keeper, the party embarks on a perilous journey to recover the Shards of Eternity, fragments of creation needed to restore balance across collapsing realms.
